name: The fourth incarnation. Mouse.
description:
After a long journey in search of a new spacesuit, my soul was embodied in a mouse. In their world there is always vanity and idleness. Mice don't starve. Any individual can find not only a mate, but also food, which has become a very important argument when choosing this body.

I had a lot of relatives. We lived as a large colony in a system of tunnels under a huge field. Everything was fine except for one terribly annoying factor – the absolute impossibility of privacy. A conscious being needs peace and its own space. Otherwise, life turns into hell.

One day I left. I was lucky. Quickly enough, I found a free mink with someone's unclaimed supplies. Life has become good. There were enough supplies for the whole winter. It was a happy time of peace and quiet. And at the end of spring, the earth suddenly trembled. There was a growing noise and suddenly, the mink crumbled and I was crushed by something very heavy. Death was instantaneous. I died a happy, lonely, well-fed mouse.
